MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the WA6 postcode area of Helsby, affecting properties in Towers Lane and surrounding area. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  9:38PM. Our engineers are on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 00:15AM . We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 11:38PM on 7th March 2021
